member.name: M:CSF.Reflection.Reflect.IsMono
member.summary: Determines whether the application is executing using the Mono framework. This uses the supported manner of detecting mono.
member.returns: true if the application is executing on the mono framework; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:CSF.Reflection.Reflect.Member(System.Linq.Expressions.Expression)
member.summary: Gets a from the given linq expression.

remarks.para: This private method wraps the differing mechanisms by which static reflection can be performed:

list.item: Determine whether or not the expression is a unary (value type) expression or not. If it is then use the operand for further analysis.
Determine whether the expression-to-analyse is a member expression or a method call expression.
Cast the expression appropriately and retirve the member.

member.param: The expression to parse for a member.
member.exception: Raised if the is null.
Raised if the does not reflect a single member.
